meanings.definition: A type of chair or table made from a single piece of material.
meanings.sent1: The monobloc in the garden is both a chair and a table.
meanings.sent2: I placed the monobloc in the living room for extra seating.
meanings.sent3: The monobloc chair looked like it was dancing when I sat on it.
meanings.sent4: The monobloc table stood sturdy like a rock in the room.
meanings.sent5: The monobloc furniture was so convenient for small spaces.

meanings.definition: A type of engine with the cylinder block and head cast as a single unit.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic explained how the monobloc engine worked in the car.
meanings.sent2: The monobloc engine design made maintenance easier for the team.
meanings.sent3: I imagined a tiny monobloc engine running a miniature car race.
meanings.sent4: The monobloc engine hummed like a content bee in the vehicle.
meanings.sent5: The monobloc motor was a marvel of engineering simplicity.
